text: "Even Flow" is a 1992 song by alternative rock band Pearl Jam and is the second single from their debut studio album Ten. It went to number 20 in New Zealand, number 22 in Australia, number 27 in the United Kingdom and number 74 in Canada. It also went to number 3 in the Billboard rock chart. ==Track listing== CD (US, Australia, Austria, Brazil, and Germany) and Cassette (Australia) #"Even Flow" (Eddie Vedder, Stone Gossard) – 4:53 #"Dirty Frank" (Dave Abbruzzese, Jeff Ament, Gossard, Mike McCready, Vedder) – 5:32 #"Oceans" (remix) (Vedder, Gossard, Ament) – 2:46 CD (UK) and 12" Vinyl (UK) #"Even Flow" (new version) (Vedder, Gossard) – 5:04 #"Dirty Frank" (Abbruzzese, Ament, Gossard, McCready, Vedder) – 5:32 #"Oceans" (Vedder, Gossard, Ament) – 2:42 7" Vinyl (UK) and Cassette (UK) #"Even Flow" (new version) (Vedder, Gossard) – 5:04 #"Oceans" (remix) (Vedder, Gossard, Ament) – 2:46 7" Vinyl (The Netherlands) and Cassette (New Zealand) #"Even Flow" (Vedder, Gossard) – 4:53 #"Dirty Frank" (Abbruzzese, Ament, Gossard, McCready, Vedder) – 5:32 ==References== Category:1992 songs Category:Pearl Jam songs
title: Even Flow
